product_name: Columbia Bora Bora Jr. Booney II Hat - Kids'
long_description: The Columbia Bora Bora(TM) Jr. Booney II hat dries in a flash, making it great for warm-weather activities near water. The wide brim protects the head, neck and eyes from the sun. Made from quick-drying, lightweight polyester with a cooling mesh upper panel and a moisture-wicking Omni-Wick(R) sweatband. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Bora Bora Jr. Booney II hat has an adjustable drawcord and toggle to customize the fit.
short_description: The Columbia Bora Bora(TM) Jr. Booney II hat dries in a flash, making it great for warm-weather activities near water. The wide brim protects the head, neck and eyes from the sun.
